name: funresd
params: class c0, class c1, wff w0

body.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfun(cres(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wfun(c0))
-| wi(wfun(c0), wfun(cres(c0, c1)))

cumulated.origin:
|- wi(w0, wfun(cres(c0, c1)))
-| wi(w0, wfun(c0))
-| wi(wfun(c0), wfun(cres(c0, c1)))

comment: A restriction of a function is a function. (Contributed by Glauco Siliprandi, 2-Jan-2022.)
